description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useReports' that fetches and manages spending-by-category and income-vs-expense reports. It includes state management for loading and error states, fetch functions with fallback mock data, and cleanup using abort controller.

methods.name: useReports({ rangeSpending = 'month', rangeIncomeExpense = '3months' } = {})
methods.description: A React hook that fetches report data related to spending categories and income versus expense over specified ranges, managing loading and error states.
